segment.source: Reports Node
segment.target: Reports Node

segment.source: Reports Node
segment.target: Reports Node

segment.source: Reports Node
segment.target: Reports Node

segment.source: The Reports node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: The Reports node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of reports.
segment.target: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of reports.

segment.source: Right-click the node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click the node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Report
segment.target: New Report

segment.source: Displays the New Report Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Report Wizard.

segment.source: The wizard has several pages.
segment.target: The wizard has several pages.

segment.source: Depending on which report you select, the remaining pages in the wizard change for the requirements of that report type.
segment.target: Depending on which report you select, the remaining pages in the wizard change for the requirements of that report type.

segment.source: Scan the following list of pages to find the pages that refer to your report:
segment.target: Scan the following list of pages to find the pages that refer to your report:

segment.source: Report Name—Enables you to select a report type from the Report Type drop-down list.
segment.target: Report Name—Enables you to select a report type from the Report Type drop-down list.

segment.source: For more information, see Application Virtualization Report Types.
segment.target: For more information, see Application Virtualization Report Types.

segment.source: Report Period—Enables you to select a radio button to specify the frequency for running the report.
segment.target: Report Period—Enables you to select a radio button to specify the frequency for running the report.

segment.source: Server—Enables you to select the Server, Server Group, or Enterprise radio button, and to select the server from the Server field and the server group from the Server Group drop-down list.
segment.target: Server—Enables you to select the Server, Server Group, or Enterprise radio button, and to select the server from the Server field and the server group from the Server Group drop-down list.

segment.source: Application—Enables you to select an application from the drop-down list of available applications.
segment.target: Application—Enables you to select an application from the drop-down list of available applications.

segment.source: When prompted, click Finish to add the report.
segment.target: When prompted, click Finish to add the report.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Right-click any report displayed under the Reports node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any report displayed under the Reports node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes the report from the Reports node.
segment.target: Deletes the report from the Reports node.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Highlights the report name so that it becomes editable text.
segment.target: Highlights the report name so that it becomes editable text.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
